name: interpolate
description: Interpolate the data to new sampling points.

attributes.name: interpolation_method
attributes.description: The method used to interpolate the samples.

attributes.name: new_start_time
attributes.description: The time of the first sample in UTC after the interpolation.

attributes.name: new_number_of_samples
attributes.description: The number of samples after the interpolation.

attributes.name: new_sampling_rate
attributes.description: The sampling rate after the interpolation.
